subject: Hello
body:
Hello
My name is Barkev Hagopian and I am one of the assistants of Mr. Bo Li
the current Deputy Managing Director of the IMF (The International
Monetary Fund) here in Washington DC, United States.
The reason for my email to you today is to let you know that, unknown
to the general public, The IMF receives close to a total of US$10
billion each year in donations from wealthy philanthropists around the
world. Some of the donations are even bestowed anonymously. I am
contacting you to let you know that I am in a position to earmark some
of these funds for disbursement which can fall under the category of
either low interest loans or humanitarian funding. I wish to use my
inside knowledge here at the IMF to retain a portion of these funds
for myself and that is why I have written to you.
Here is my proposal:
If you have a business that you think would qualify for either a low
interest loan or humanitarian assistance please get in touch with me
upon receiving this email. I would then refer you to the contact that
would help you by filling out the exact forms needed and guiding you
through the procedures for you to receive funds anywhere from $5
million to $20 million. You would in effect have an “inside person”
telling you exactly how to get funds from The IMF in a fully
legitimate way. Most people have no idea how to achieve this, but I
have the knowledge and know which strings to pull to make it happen.
For my assistance, I would ask that after you receive funding, that
you kick back 10% of the funds to me if it is a loan, and 15% of the
funds if it is for humanitarian purposes.
Please let me know if you are interested and I will call you for a
discussion. It is against protocol to offer anyone this type of
assistance, so I have written to you from my private email to start. I
can give you my official email address at the IMF once we get started.
If I do not hear back from you in the next 5 business days I will
assume you are not interested and I will continue my search for
someone who is. However if you are interested, please send me your
direct phone number so that we can speak.
Hoping to hear from you.
Barkev Hagopian

subject: Re:   Hello
body:
Hello Barkev Hagopian,

Thank you for reaching out to me with such an interesting proposal. I must say, it's not every day that one receives an email from someone associated with the IMF! 

I'm curious about this process. Could you please elaborate more on how these funds are usually allocated? And what kind of businesses typically qualify for these low-interest loans or funding assistance?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Scott

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Attn: Scott

Hello,

Thank you for your response, to make an informed decision to proceed, we
will need to receive your contact information and a proof of
identification. please fill the attached IMF funding form and send back
with A copy of your valid ID, international passport or driver's license or
national ID.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Sincerely yours,

Barkev Hagopian
Phone & WhatsApp No: 929 900 1612

subject: Re: Fwd: Hello / REMINDER
body:
Hello Barkev,

Thank you for your prompt response. I'm really excited about this opportunity, but I have a few questions before we proceed further. Could you please explain more about the IMF funding form? What kind of information does it require? 

Also, could you provide me with more details about the process after submitting the form? I'm just trying to understand everything clearly.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Scott
